content:
765 Sexual preferences and sexual fetishes are not the same.  This dike nails it. posted 1 day ago by KuzoKevin 113 comments award share report block Concerned Citizen @BGatesIsaPyscho • 2d “I’m an OG Lesbian” “LGBT Serves a Dark Agenda” “Gay Rights have been hijacked by the TQ+” One of the best take downs of the Marxist Grooming Cult you will ever hear.
113 comments Sort by Top Top New Worst Old Save Mount_10_ear 55 points 1 day ago No such thing as " gay rights"  , its just another form of mental illness .. permalink award report block reply HunterBidensPC 36 points 1 day ago The right to marry other men in the eyes of God is abhorrent. Why should i care that the TQ+ highjacked their movement? It was a degenerate movement based in self interest of course it was doomed to turn into what it is now permalink parent award report block reply ViagraFalls 11 points 1 day ago Well first heterosexuals started having gay sex. Then gay sex became okay to them. What I mean is that sex became for fun and promiscuity abounded like fa66ots do. Any procreation was often an unwanted side effect. permalink parent award report block reply kornesque 5 points 1 day ago This. Notice they started by normalizing birth control. Abhorrent in the eyes of God and the springboard to everything else. Once it became culturally acceptable to view sex as primarily for pleasure rather procreation, then it became an outrage to restrict people who wanted sex for pleasure without procreation for any reason. The TQ+ is just a more positive range on the numberline of degeneracy that LGB already lands on. permalink parent award report block reply sun_wolf 4 points 1 day ago The main difference between straight people and gay people is if a straight dude is a foot fetishist and needs to rub on a foot to get off, he knows that’s a mis-use of the human body for sexual gratification and that if every other human being was like him, no more human beings would be created. Gay people don’t seem capable of this same insight. If you ask a gay person if the world would be better if ALL people were gay, shooting their semen into men’s buttholes or getting screwed by plastic dildos made in China, they would say yes. But that would be the end of human procreation because you can’t make a baby in a man’s butthole and you can’t make a baby from a hunk of rainbow plastic. permalink parent award report block reply view 1 more comments... MAGAMight 9 points 1 day ago Ironic that the degenerates are calling out  degenerates as being too degenerate permalink parent award report block reply Threaper666 3 points 21 hours ago Exactly.  They laid the ground work.  They created the Map.  No pun intended. permalink parent award report block reply HunterBidensPC 2 points 21 hours ago Underrated comment since they literally did create the MAPs permalink parent award report block reply booblitchutz 6 points 1 day ago No such thing as a “lesbian”. Every one I’ve ever met was a woman hurt by men who just noped out of normal relationships as a result. The most honest lesbian I ever met said that it’s all just playing house and partnering with each other for companionship and protection. She said that she has never actually been “attracted” sexually to her “partner”. And that’s true. Women cannot sexually attract each other, it’s a biological impossibility. Men can’t either, but men are driven by the urge to ejaculate which is stronger than the woman’s urge to climax. permalink parent award report block reply sun_wolf 4 points 1 day ago They also repeat the exact same dynamic of heterosexual relationships (one butch, one femme) within their lesbian relationships, which is an obvious giveaway that homosexuality is a fetish, not an identity. They can’t even PRETEND to be gay very well, and their inherent biology still presents itself. permalink parent award report block reply Now_On_to_Mars 2 points 1 day ago Which is ironic cause abusive lesbian relationships are all too common permalink parent award report block reply booblitchutz 3 points 1 day ago Yes, well imagine the frustration of a “marriage” completely void of sexual chemistry, and when you do “have sex” its unsatisfying biologically. After a while it’s hard not to resent your roommate in that scenario. permalink parent award report block reply DManthey 3 points 1 day ago And discrimination. Why do they have more rights than the rest of us? permalink parent award report block reply Dev404 2 points 1 day ago The only thing I can remember that gays were excluded from was the military. However, it's not like they went checking if you were gay by running a complete background check of your sexual history, you could just say you weren't and don't give any obvious signs. Apart from that, I don't recall gays being disallowed from anything by law or policy. The gay rights thing is an exaggerated issue brought on by feminists - again. The entire existence of feminism was unnecessary and was nothing more than the biggest cultural weapon psyop ever created and massively succeeded in demoralizing every country it touched. permalink parent award report block reply vote_for_MAGA_2020 29 points 1 day ago "gay rights" should never have been a thing, so whatever she's saying is stupid This is not a "takedown" permalink award report block reply KuzoKevin OP 7 points 1 day ago I don't think gays should get special treatment under the guise of "rights", but I think they should be left alone. permalink parent award report block reply peterthegreen 30 points 1 day ago They need to leave the kids alone. permalink parent award report block reply airborne3502 15 points 1 day ago That's the big one. The LGB community also has an issue with grooming and recruitment. That's why so many want to be teachers, scout leaders, youth ministers and other positions of authority that put them in contact with minors. permalink parent award report block reply Floppybutthole 2 points 21 hours ago If gays looked at themselves long and hard and understood pedophilia wasn't cool maybe I'd accept them.   But just hop into any random gay bar and see how many 16 y/o kids are with 40 y/o men. So yeah fuck off faggots your entire gay culture is degenerate bullshit and you need to be beat back into the shadows.   Fucking rainbow flags and shit in the class room wtf is wring with you all. permalink parent award report block reply ancillasedet 1 points 1 day ago That's what she said. permalink parent award report block reply Mortal_Wombat 8 points 1 day ago If they didn't flaunt it around how would anyone really know? If they dressed normal and acted normal they wouldn't have any problems. It's the attention seeking behavior that gets them attention...many times negative. permalink parent award report block reply vote_for_MAGA_2020 7 points 1 day ago They need to be shoved back into the closet. Too many militant gays trying to push their lifestyle on children and not enough so-called "silent majority" gays not saying anything. This gay shit is what led us to trannies, men in women's sports, etc. permalink parent award report block reply ViagraFalls 4 points 1 day ago Gays should be low status people that reside in some dark corner of society. The only reason I say that is people’s kids can turn out being gay. You can’t really control it out absolutely prevent it. permalink parent award report block reply booblitchutz 2 points 1 day ago The Borg won’t stay on deck 15. permalink parent award report block reply load 9 more comments... MissileToad 25 points 1 day ago The entire point of made-up terms like "sexual preference" and "sexual orientation" is to take  unhealthy twisted perversions of sex and make them sound like normal viable options. From "undocumented immigrant" to "products of conception", you are swimming in language carefully designed to make you only think thoughts in one certain direction. permalink award report block reply Klaus73 7 points 1 day ago I remember when "sex" and "gender" were the same thing. permalink parent award report block reply bill_in_texas 19 points 1 day ago I mean, they are all deviants, her argument is, well, we're not as deviant as those people.  Maybe not, but you're still deviants, and you paved the way for more deviancy, so really, it's your fault, it's your bed you made. permalink award report block reply booblitchutz 3 points 1 day ago It’s a spectrum. Gay or lez is just a stop along the way to trans. Trans is taking the mindset of being gay or lez to its logical conclusion. You reject your sexual role, that makes you gay or lez. You further reject your sex, that makes you trans. It’s all just degrees. permalink parent award report block reply deleted 15 points 1 day ago lul_cheto 4 points 1 day ago Or theyre just degenerate faggots who are responsible for their own life choices. permalink parent award report block reply booblitchutz 2 points 1 day ago I think lots of things can cause severe self-loathing. That’s really what can manifest as gay-> trans. You hate yourself so much you reject your own identity. permalink parent award report block reply UncleSlayton 4 points 24 hours ago When a boy is entering puberty and he's sexualized by a grown man it rewires his pleasure/reward and ties it to men.  It's straight out of Pavlov. This is why gays abuse boys at such a high rate.  They were almost always abused at that age themselves. permalink parent award report block reply BillGateCanSuckIt 14 points 1 day ago Exactly how environmentalism has been hijacked by the climate change cult. permalink award report block reply glow-operator-2-0 2 points 1 day ago Ssshhh. If MAGA fails maybe it will be God's punishment on the USA for electing an adulterous man who took three wives. permalink parent award report block reply sun_wolf 4 points 1 day ago President Trump doesn’t promote adultery though. And adulterers do not get a month of celebration and a parade where the whole world comes together to promote adultery to schoolchildren. There is no adultery flag. There are no hiring quotas where a certain percentage of your employees need to be adulterers. There is no adulterer history month. Adulterers don’t go to public libraries to read the steamiest chapters of Lady Chatterley’s Lover to toddlers. permalink parent award report block reply Glory-Unto-God 1 points 1 day ago Adultery is actually never referred to as an abomination in the bible. permalink parent award report block reply lul_cheto 12 points 1 day ago Op is a retard, and everyone trying to rehabilitate these perverts is our enemy. permalink award report block reply 2008RonPaul2012 11 points 1 day ago The tq+ is the acceleration that proves the slippery slope is real. Sorry dikes, you've been exposed. permalink award report block reply Truthisunpopular 4 points 1 day ago Yup, she helped create the slippery slope so she deserves to fight and die on it with the rest of the degenerate freaks. permalink parent award report block reply rebuildingMyself 3 points 1 day ago And if she's gay she's probably a feminazi, which blurred gender definitions a generation ago so they could have women invade male spaces while preserving their own. permalink parent award report block reply reversethefraud 9 points 1 day ago "TQ+ is a trojan horse to mainstream their degeneracy" Now do gay marriage. permalink award report block reply RaginJake379 2 points 1 day ago The pot calling the kettle a faggot permalink parent award report block reply rebuildingMyself 2 points 1 day ago Muh slippery slope got pretty damn slippery permalink parent award report block reply 7h3RussianHacker 9 points 1 day ago I don't care. Do not be deceived: neither the sexually immoral, nor idolaters, nor adulterers, nor men who practice homosexuality, nor thieves, nor the greedy, nor drunkards, nor revilers, nor swindlers will inherit the kingdom of God.” permalink award report block reply 67Vert 1 points 1 day ago We are all sinners. People focus on homosexuality because it’s the only sin they didn’t commit.    Are Lesbos on the clear? permalink parent award report block reply Perseverant 3 points 1 day ago You're correct that we're all sinners who have fallen short of the glory of God.  That's why we need Jesus' sacrifice on the cross - only a perfect son can reconcile a broken humanity with a perfect father. That passage, from 1 Corinthians chapter 6, is talking about the consequences of sin.  OP left off the critically important verse 11, which immediately follows that quotation "And such were some of you. But you were washed, you were sanctified, you were justified in the name of the Lord Jesus Christ and by the Spirit of our God." The key is "such were some of you."  The distinction being made is old vs. new.  Before vs. after.  "Before you openly indulged in all of these sins worthy of hell.  Now you know Jesus and have turned away from them, and Jesus covers them." So, if we live in open rebellion against God by going our own way, whether living in homosexuality or indulging in fornication, or thieving or murdering or whatever else - yeah - that verse is a warning sign of the consequences.  We must turn away from sin and follow Jesus. John 14:23-24 says "Jesus replied, 'Anyone who loves me will obey my teaching. My Father will love them, and we will come to them and make our home with them. Anyone who does not love me will not obey my teaching. These words you hear are not my own; they belong to the Father who sent me.'" permalink parent award report block reply Steve56775 1 points 1 day ago Damn the kingdom must be just about empty, no wonder Satan is so strong. permalink parent award report block reply RudeFrog 3 points 1 day ago Sorry you don't get to separate your evil from this other evil, the acceptance of your evil is what spawned the new evil, in other words, trans fags are your lesbian agenda babies. permalink award report block reply DeplorableLA 3 points 1 day ago Agree with her.
